title: "Equation Art"
content:
**Equation Art**

Welcome to Equation Art, a website dedicated to showcasing the beauty of mathematics through minimalist and modern design. Our main attraction is a stunning wallpaper featuring a graph of complex mathematical equations, arranged in a way that is both aesthetically pleasing and intellectually stimulating.

Our goal is to inspire a love of math and science by presenting these subjects in a visually appealing way. Whether you're a student, teacher, or just someone who appreciates the elegance of numbers, we hope you'll find something to enjoy on our site.

In addition to our signature wallpaper, we also feature a variety of other designs that showcase different areas of mathematics, from geometry to calculus. We update our collection regularly, so be sure to check back often for new additions.

Thank you for visiting Equation Art, and we hope you'll join us in celebrating the beauty of math!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a graph of complex mathematical equations, arranged in a minimalist and modern design."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
